correctness.description: Accuracy of the provided solution relative to the correct answer.

completeness.description: The degree to which the solution is complete and all aspects of the question have been addressed.

reasoning_depth.description: The extent to which the solution reflects deep and logical reasoning.

efficiency.description: How efficiently the agent completes the task, considering the steps taken to reach the solution.

robustness.description: The ability of the agent to handle different types of questions and its adaptability to various domains.

reliability.description: The consistency of the agent in providing correct solutions over multiple iterations or tasks.

traceability.description: The clarity and trackability of the reasoning process the agent followed to arrive at the solution.

originality.description: The uniqueness of the solution and the extent to which the answer is not easily found in existing literature or internet sources.

communication.description: The effectiveness with which the agent communicates the solution and reasoning path.
